sentences.en: At the shrine of the god there were offerings, libations and incense.
sentences.cn: 神殿里供奉着牺牲、鬯酒和贡香。

sentences.en: Every evening in those days the BBC played "God Save The King"
sentences.cn: 那些日子里，英国广播公司每天晚上都会播放《天佑吾王》。

sentences.en: For God's sake shut up. I can't hear myself think!
sentences.cn: 看在老天爷的份上，闭嘴吧。吵死我了！

sentences.en: Getting my work done! My God! As if it mattered.
sentences.cn: 把我的工作做完！老天！好像它真的很重要似的。

sentences.en: God grant he will soon regain his freedom.
sentences.cn: 但愿他很快能够重获自由。

sentences.en: God help anyone who tried to jolly me out of my bad mood.
sentences.cn: 想让我摆脱恶劣情绪开心起来是很难的。

sentences.en: He believes in God.
sentences.cn: 他信奉上帝。

sentences.en: He has submitted himself to the will of God.
sentences.cn: 他让自己听从上帝的意志。

sentences.en: Let us now confess our sins to Almighty God.
sentences.cn: 现在让我们向上帝忏悔我们的罪恶。

sentences.en: Mars was the Roman god of war.
sentences.cn: 马尔斯是古罗马战神。

sentences.en: Oh God, you get so flaming worked up about everything.
sentences.cn: 哦，天哪，你总是这么激动，真该死。

sentences.en: one day, God willing, she and John might have a daughter.
sentences.cn: 如上帝许可，将来有一天她和约翰会生个女儿。

sentences.en: please God the money will help us find a cure.
sentences.cn: 如果幸运的话，这钱能帮我们找到一个良方。

sentences.en: Shiva is a dark god; he dwells in the mountains and deserts.
sentences.cn: 湿婆神匿影藏形于深山和沙漠之中。

sentences.en: Thank God they're not on my manor any more.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，他们再也不在我的辖区里了。

sentences.en: The MP described the killings as a blasphemy before God.
sentences.cn: 这位下院议员称这些谋杀是在上帝面前的公然亵渎。

sentences.en: The President described the disaster as an act of God.
sentences.cn: 总统将这场灾难说成是天灾。

sentences.en: They brought up their children to be God-fearing Christians.
sentences.cn: 他们将孩子培养成了虔诚的基督教徒。

sentences.en: We have lost everything, but thank God, our lives have been spared.
sentences.cn: 我们已经失去了一切，不过谢天谢地，总算是保住了性命。

sentences.en: what in God's name are you doing up there?.
sentences.cn: 你到底在那儿干什么？。

sentences.en: what in God's name are you doing up there?.
sentences.cn: 你到底在那儿干什么？。

sentences.en: Why in God's name did you have to tell her?
sentences.cn: 为什么你非得告诉她呢？

sentences.en: You have no right to play God in my life!
sentences.cn: 你无权对我的人生指手画脚！

words.tran_cn: 不信神的，无神论者的；不敬神的
上帝般的；似神的；庄严的

phrases.tran_cn: 万能的上帝；全能真神；全能的神（等于God Amighty）
上帝之子（70年代一个基督教原教旨主义教派）
全能的神；全能的上帝；全能真主
［用来表示相信某人处于困难（或危险、无助）的境地］ 老天才帮得上忙
圣父（基督教教义中三位一体的首位，作为造物主和有至高权威的上帝）
圣子（视作基督教教义中三位一体的第二位）；上帝（作为化身复活的救世主）
［用来表示愿望，希望能如愿以偿］如系天意；如上帝许可
［用于问句以强调愤怒，吃惊］究竟

phrases.phrase: in the lap of the gods

phrases.tran_cn: 以上帝自居，装作无所不能
［用以强调强烈的愿望］如果上帝保佑的话，如果幸运的话
神的光芒下；在上帝庇护下
神的忿怒；神之愤怒；上帝的惩罚

trans.tran_cn: 天啊！啊呀！（用于表示怀疑、失望、烦恼、厌烦等）

trans.tran_en: The name God is given to the spirit or being who is worshipped as the creator and ruler of the world, especially by Jews, Christians, and Muslims
